description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 一、 簡介二、 數學模式三、 小信號干擾之系統響應四、 同步機之模擬五、 同步機之線性模式六、 激磁系統七、 激磁對穩定度之影響八、 多機組系統之穩定度
description.en: 一、 Introduction二、 The Mathematical Model三、 System response to small disturbances四、 The simulation of synchronous machines五、 Linear Models of synchronous machines六、 Excitation System七、 Effect of excitation on stability八、 Multimachine Systems with constant Impedance loads

description.zh: 1. 電力系統經濟調度2. 傳輸損失3. 機組規劃4. 水火力機組協調5. 發電控制6. 電力系統互聯7. 電力系統安全度8. 狀態評估
description.en: 1. Economic dispatch of power system2. transmission losses3. Unit commitment4. coordination of hydro-thermal generators5. generation control6. inter-connected power systems7. Security of power system8. State estimation

description.zh: 此課程在介紹 Optimal Control 的理論基礎與其應用﹐範圍從古典的早期發展到最新的進展都包括在內，其目的在使同學能具有最佳控制器設計能力。 內容包括: 最佳化問題求解、線性二次調整器設計、線性二次高斯觀測器設計。此外，現代控制中常用的loop shaping及loop transfer recovery技術亦將在課程中介紹。預修課程 ： 線性控制系統(可同時修)、工程數學
description.en: 1.	Introduction.2.	Mathematical preliminaries for optimal control.3.	Classical linear quadratic optimal control, including regulation & tracking control.4.	Observer based optimal control (LQG control). 5.	Loop shaping and LTR control.  This is a course designed for graduate students which will provide techniques that can help you to design an optimal controller for linear systems with a specific performance index. Concepts such as optimality condition, linear quadratic regulation (LQR), and linear quadratic gaussian (LQG) problem are introduced in the course. In addition, the course also includes the loop shaping concept and the loop transfer recovery (LTR) technique which are frequently used in the modern control.

description.zh: 1. 簡介 2. Bayesian， Minimax 原裡分析和測試 3. 古典的假說測試和混合式假說測試 4. 離散時間信號的偵測 5. 連續時間信號的偵測 6. 循序性的假說測試 7. 參數估測
description.en: 1. Introduction 2. Bayesian, Minimax analysis and testing 3. Classical hypothesis testing and composite hypothesis testing 4. Signal detection in discrete time 5. Signal detection in continuous time 6. Sequential hypothesis testing 7. Parameter estimation

description.zh: 本課程主要敘述數位語音訊號的處理技術及語音相關應用。討論的課題主要包括語音分析的基本聲學原理如發音模型與語音特徵分析，以及語音編碼、語音合成、語音辨認等重要應用。
description.en: This course is intended to introduce the fundamentals of speech signal processing and related applications. The topics it will address include speech production model, extraction and evaluation of speech features, basic principles of speech analysis and synthesis, speech coding, and speech recognition, etc.

description.zh: 1. 一般性介紹（適應系統、適應性之線性結合器）2. 恆靜訊號市之適應性理論（二次式行為表面特性、Searching行為表面、適應性之梯度估測法）3. 適應性法則與架構（LMS法則、牛頓法則、其他法則等）4. 工程應用
description.en: 1. General Introduction（Adaptive Systems、The Adaptive    Linear Combiner）2. Theory of Adaptive with Stationary Signals（Properties of    the Quadratic Performance Surface、Searching the       Performance Surface、Gradient Estimation & its Effects on    Adaptation ）3. Adaptive Algorithms and Structures（The LMS Algorithm、   Newton Algorithm、  Other Adaptive Algorithm）4. Engineering Applications。Prerequisite：Linear Algebra、     Signal & Systems、  Random Process

description.zh: 1.簡介2.實體層  (數位及類比資料傳輸,媒體)3.媒體存取層  (區域及廣域網路,IEEE802協定,光纖及MAC子層)4.鏈路層  (錯誤更正,流量控制,滑窗協定,協定效應,)5.網路層  (網路層組織,Routing,阻塞及相互連接)6.傳輸層  (傳輸提供之服務,傳輸層之元件)7.會議層  (資料交換,交談處理,同步)8.展現層  (資料表現,壓縮,網路安全及隱私)9.應用層  (檔案傳輸,電子郵件,虛擬終端機)
description.en: 1 INTRODUCTION 1.1 Network goals 1.2 Applications of networks 2 THE  PHYSICAL LAYER3 THE  MEDIUM  ACCESS  SUBLAYER4 THE  DATA  LINK  LAYER  4.1 Error control 4.2 Flow control  4.3 Link management5  THE  NETWORK  LAYER     5.1 Services  provided to  the       transport layer   5.2 Routing  congestion  5.3    Internetworking6 THE  TRANSPORT  LAYER  6.1 Services provided to the session   layer  6.2 Connection management7 THE SESSION LAYER  7.1 Data exchange  7.2 Dialog management  7.3 Synchronization

description.zh: 本課程將著重於線性或非線性系統的適應控制。內容包括：適應性的概念與學習控制的關係、適應控制系統穩定度分析、參數估測、自我調適控制、參考模式適應控制。除此之外，軌跡追蹤適應控制器設計及適應控制的應用亦將於課程中介紹。
description.en: 1.Introduction2.Mathematical preliminaries3.Identification4.Adaptive control5.Robust adaptive control6.Advanced topics in identification and adaptive control7.Adaptive control of a class of nonlinear systemsThis course is designed for graduate students which will provide techniques that can help you to analyze linear or nonlinear systems with unknown parameters. Concepts such as system identification, self-tuning, and model reference are introduced in the course and you can use them to design the controller you need for the desired tracking purpose. Moreover, the applications of adaptive control are included in the content.

description.zh: 這們課程主要是討論人工智慧(AI)的理論基礎與相關應用，課程內容包含：    1. AI 問題的解題方法（搜尋技巧）    2. 知識表示的方法    3. AI 程式語言：LISP與 PROLOG    4. 推論方法5.  進階研究主題
description.en: This course provides a thorough discussion of AI's theoretical foundations and advanced applications. These are the following :     1. the fundamentals of problem solving (search algorithm)    2.  knowledge representation    3. AI algorithms and data structure in LISP and PROLOG    4. algorithms for reasoning    5. advanced topics for AI problem solving

description.zh: 1. 電壓型變頻器控制 2 電流型變頻器控制 3. 交流電機模式4. 雙向變頻器系統 5.變頻器系統模擬
description.en: 1 VOLTAGE SOURCE INVERTER CONTROL 2. CURRENT SOUR INVERTER CONTROL 3. MODELING OF AC DRIVES4. 5IDIRECTIONAL INVERTER SYSTEM 5. SIMULATION OF INVERTER SYSTEM

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 課程內容包括擴散原理、兩相之間的質傳理論，亂流的質量傳遞，涉及化學反應的質傳，同時發生質量與熱量的傳遞，以及多成分的擴散現象。
description.en: Topics covered include theory of diffusion, interphase mass transfer theory, mass transfer in turbulent flow, mass transfer with chemical reaction, simultaneous mass and heat transfer, multicomponent diffusion.

description.zh: 反應工程是在商業規模之考慮下對化學反應開發利用之相關工程活動。其目的在成功的設計和操作化學反應器，並使化學工程在工程專業中成為一個獨特的支系。此高等反應工程是延續大學部己學習在均相中有關之簡單觀念及理論，並推展到非均相較複雜系統之設計及操作上。學生在修習此課後，對於較複雜之反應器有清晰及整體之概念。
description.en: Under commercial scale consideration, chemical reaction engineering is that engineering concerning the exploitiaton of chemical reactions Its goal is the successful design and operation of chemical reactors and it sets chemical engineering apart as a distinct branch of the engineering profession. This aduanced chemical reaction engineering is a continuative study of simple idea and principle for homogeneous systems and extended to heterogeneous and more complex systems for design and operation. After study in this course, the student can obtain clear and unified coucept of complex reactor systems.

description.zh: 本課程是介紹工程具有基礎生物催化劑之知識生命之元素。內容包括組織、特性、應用工程及調製。酵素能催化加速反應速度，由於降低活化能。但不能改變化平衡。酵素泛用於工業上，特別在醫藥用途上，很重要。
description.en: This course is to introduce the engineers have basic knowledge of biocalysts-the element of life, including its. Compositions, characteristics, application, engineering, and their preparation. Enzyme can accelate the rate of reaction, by decrease of activation energy. But it could not change chemical equilibrium. Enzyme are widely used in industry and have significant medical application.

description.zh: 半導體構裝技術是將積體電路和其它電元件，依設計聯結在一系統中，再以構裝材料將晶片、基座及釘架封包。本課程將介紹陶瓷構裝和高分子構裝、及其相關技術、與工業現況。
description.en: Semiconductor packaging is to allow the chips be incorporated into an individual protective package, mounted with other components in hybrid or multichip modules, or connected directly onto a printed circuit board. This course will introduce both ceramic packaging and polymer packaging and their corresponding technology.

description.zh: 介紹化工廠廢棄物對安全、健康、環境之影嚮及化工產品之生命週期評估。舊程序之製程改善及建立完整的廢棄物管理體系，以達廢棄物最少化之目的，新程序之設計則對反應器、分離程序、熱交換器之程序整合及公用設施等，實施源頭減廢及回收，以達潔淨生產之目的。
description.en: Introduction to the safety, health and environmental impact of wastes of chemical process industries and life cycle assessment of chemical engineering products. Waste minimization of existing process through changes in industrial process and setup of waste management hiarachy. For the new process, focus are on the source reduction and recycle of reactors, separators, heat exchange networks and utilities, etc.

description.zh: 本課程將基本物理化學原理應用在材料科學上，探討電子組態、化學鍵及晶體結構間之關係。內容包括晶體結構、X 光繞射分析、相平衡、材料之光學及電學性質及材料表面之鑑定及分析。
description.en: This subject covers the basic principles of physical chemistry and shows how they apply in describing the behavior of the solid state. The relationship between electronic structure, chemical bonding and crystal surface is developed. Attention is also given to characterization of atomic and molecular arrangements in materials as well as quantum optical and electrical effects in nanoscale materials.

description.zh: 利用單元介紹的方式，將生物化學、微生物學、分子生物學、基因工程等原理，應用在微生物或蛋白質品種改良上，並介紹生物活性物質，如氨基酸、抗生素、免疫體、酵素、激素、特殊結構之蛋白、脂肪、醣類、脂肪酸、抗體等之製造方法。
description.en: Biotechnology applications in mutant microbial and protein productions are to be introduced based on the knowledge of biochemistry, microbiology, molecular biology, and genetic engineering, etc. This course also introduces the productions of some living blocks, such as amino acids, antibodies, enzymes, hormone, proteins, lipids, etc.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 冶煉技術係介紹金屬提煉方法之原理與技術。內容包括火法冶煉,濕法冶煉及電化冶煉。火法冶煉包括熔煉,精煉及蒸餾水之化學原理。濕法冶煉包括浸出,固液分離,淨液及金屬採取等。電化冶煉包括電解精煉,電解採取及熔融鹽電解等之原理與方法。
description.en: This course introduces the fundamental principles and techniques of metals production. It consists of pyrometallurgy. hydrometallurgy and electrometallurgy. In pyometallurgy, chemical principles of smelting. Refining and distillation are discussed; in hydrometallurgy, leaching. precipitation  purification and metals recovery are described; in electrometallurgy. basics of electrochemistry, electrolytic refining. Electrolytic winning and electrolyzed in molten bath are introduced.

description.zh: 一、張量分析(Tensor  analysis)二、熱性質(Thermal properties)三、電性質(Electrical  Properties)四、介電性質(Dielectric  Properties)五、磁性質(Magnetic  Properties)六、 光學性質(Optical  Properties)
description.en: This course is a special topics of Physical properties of Material.

description.zh: 本課程以介紹各種金屬表面被覆之基本原理，特性測試及其工程上之應用。內容有擴散被覆、PVD、CVD、電鍍及陽極處理等方法；基本真空技術，被覆層特性，以及表面被覆層之應用。
description.en: This course introduces the basic principles of metals surface coating，properties test and its engineering applications.The contents include Diffusion Coatings、PVD、CVD、Electroplatings and Anodic Coatings treatment；Elementary Vacuum Technologies，coating layer properties and its applications.

description.zh: 一、簡介(Outline)二、導電材料(Conductors)三、電阻材料(Resistors)四、絕緣材料(Insulators)五、半導體材料(Semiconductors)六、介電材料(Dielectrics)七、磁性材料(Magnetics)八、壓電材料(Piezoelectrics)九、超導材料(Superconductors)十、感測材料(Sensors)
description.en: This course is a special topics of Electronic Materials.

description.zh: 本課程將討論凝固組織之控制因子，平衡及非平衡狀態下金屬凝固現象，凝固界面之溶質分佈，單晶成長技術，凝固之過冷界面穩定理論，共晶型組織之成長，凝固之熱流分析，凝固之成核成長及粗性及均質處，理凝固理論之應用及鑄造工程簡介。
description.en: The subject area covers the following topics: Control variable of solidification structure and its application; Single crystal growths from the melt and solid; Heat flow in single crystal growth; Solute distribution in solidification, various cases will be treated in detail; Constitutional undercooling and interface stability; Solidification of castings and ingots; Lamellar eutectic growth; Nucleation growth and coarsening; Foundry engineering; Defects analysis in cast construction.

description.zh: 本課程在討論金屬性質與應用在整形外科和牙醫界。課程內容包括生醫材料之發展,牙醫材料之應用,複合材料在生醫工程之應用,生醫陶瓷,生醫材料之腐蝕機制以及生醫材料之工程問題。
description.en: The topics of this course include the properties of metals and polymeric materials, and their applications in the orthopedic and dental fields. The course contains the development of biomaterials, the application of materialsfor dentistry and dental surgery, composite materials in biomedical engineering, bioceramics, corrosion mechanisms of metallic biomaterials and engineering problems associated with materials.

description.zh: 本課程從礦物的化學成分、化學鍵及其晶體結構之理論詳細討論礦物的物理及化學性質。再就各項理化性質在選礦、冶煉、化工製造及其它物理加工等方面之應用分別舉例介紹。
description.en: Systematic Study of physical and chemical properties of minerals, and relationships of properties with chemical  compositions, chemical bonding mechanisms and crystal  structures.  Application examples are introduced in the  fields of mineral processing, metal extraction, chemical  industry, etc..

description.zh: 對無機化合物之結構，化學性質等，利用量子化學，群論及結晶化學等加以探討。以配合天然礦物之形成，產狀，地球化學及環境化學等學科之授課內容。
description.en: The chemical structure and properties of inorganic compounds, which are useful for the following courses: the forming and occurrence of minerals, earth and environmental chemistry, will be discussed by using quantum chemistry, group theory and crystallography.

description.zh: 一、壩址工程地質案例研究二、隧道工程案例研討。三、邊坡穩定工程案例研討。四、道路工程案例研討。五、山坡地開發工程案例研討。六、超高層建築基礎工程案例研討。七、地震分析。
description.en: 1.Case study, geological case analysis for dam2.Tunnel engineering case study3.Slope stability case study4.Road engineering case study5.Slope development case study6.The foundation of extra high building case study7.Earthquake analysis

description.zh: 一、應力及應變分析。 二、線彈性破壞理論。 三、黏彈性破壞理論。 四、岩石動態行為。 五、岩石材料性質。六、岩體特性。七、大地應力應變現地量測。八、岩石模型。九、岩石爆破與開挖。十、地下工程設計及施工。十一、監測系統。
description.en: 一、Stress and strain analysis二、Linear elastical failure theory三、Visco-elastic failure theory四、Dynamics behavior of rocks五、Rock properties六、Rock behavior七、In-situ stress and strain measurement八、Rock model九、Rock blasting and excavation十、Underground engineering operation十一、Monitoring system

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機電系統產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等。可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Mechatronics in Industry, Seminars.

description.zh: 控制理論及應用簡介、線性空間及線性運算子、線性動態方程式及反應、可控制性可觀測性及穩定性、狀態回授及狀態預估、多變數I/O控制器設計及應用。
description.en: Introduction, Linear spaces and linear operators, linear dynamic equations, controllability, observability, stability analysis, state feedback and state prediction, multi-input multi-output systems, controller design and application.

description.zh: 硬體簡介、影像處理(單色、彩色、3D及即時)、圖案識別(Patten Recognition)、機械視覺於順序控制之應用、機械視覺於回授控制之應用、高速檢測、機械人與機械視覺之結合及應用。
description.en: Introduction to Hardware of Vision System, Image Processing (Monochrome, Color, 3D and real-time), Pattern Recognition, Application of MV to Sequential Control Application of MV to Feedback Control. High Speed Inspection, Combined Applications of Robotics and MV.

description.zh: 機械動態系統及表示法、變分原理(Variational Principles)、Lagrange方程式、Hamilton原理、系統分析、迴歸性判別法、判別法則及選定、控制應用。
description.en: Dynamical system representation and Modeling of Mechanical systems, Variational Principles Lagrange equation, Hamiltion Principles, System Analysis, System Identification and Application.

description.zh: 介紹非傳統加工方法及加工相關的自動化與控制技術，包括：製程控制、數值控制、幾何資料處理、進給驅動器、NC機器的位置量測系統、自動化加工的機器監視與診斷、電腦整合製造。
description.en: Introduce the nontraditional manufacturing methods and related automation and control technology, including: process control, numerical control, geometric data processing, driving systems, NC machine position measurement system, automatic manufacturing monitoring and diagnostics, computer integrated manufacturing.

description.zh: 機械手臂基礎理論，內容包含座標轉換、機械臂運動學、反運動學、動力學、軌跡規畫、機械臂設計、機械臂控制、機械臂的程式語言等。
description.en: It is a fundamental course concerning the theories of robotic manipulators. Topics contain frame transformations, manipulator kinematics, inverse kinematics, dynamics, trajectory planning, manipulator design, control of manipulators, robot programming languages.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。工程最佳化方法導論、線性規劃法、非線性規劃法、多目標函數最佳化、近代數學規劃法介紹、精密機電元件與系統之最佳設計。
description.en: Engineering Optimization Concepts, Linear Programming Methods, Nonlinear Programming Methods, Multi-objective Optimization, Introduction to Modern Mathematical Programming Techniques, and Optimum Design of Precision Machine Components and Systems.

notes: 與自動化所,車輛所合開

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study.Seminar.Group meeting.

description.zh: 1.平行編譯器架構 2.各種平行架構介紹 3.以USE-DEF chains 的純量分析 4.陣列指標程序呼叫及程予與程序間的資料相依性分析 5.迴圈重構技術 6.區域性最佳化 7.平行性分析 8.向量分析 9.訊息傳遞機器 10.可擴充式共享記憶體機器
description.en: 1.Structure of a parallel compiler 2.Survey of various parallel architecture model 3.Scalar analysis with factored USE-DEF chains 4.Data dependence analysis for arrays, pointer,procedure calls, and interprocedural analysis5.Loop restructuring 6.Optimizing for locality 7.Concurrency analysis 8.Vector Analysis 9.Message-passing machines10.Scalable shared-memory machines

description.zh: 1.微波傳輸線2.微波元件3.微波材料4.微波量測5.微波傳輸轉換6.微波耦合7.微波濾波器8.微波天線
description.en: 1.Microware Transmission Lines2.Microware Elements3.Microware Matericals4.Microware Measurements5.Microware Transitions6.Microware Couplers7.Microware Filters8.Microware Antennas

description.zh: 1.模糊系統2.模糊關係3.模糊量度4.模糊邏輯和近似理解5.模糊控制系統6.回饋類神經網路和監督學習7.無監督學習類神經網路8.迴授類神經網路9.基因演算法10.模糊類神經整合系統11.模糊類神經控制12.應用
description.en: 1. Fuzzy system2. Fuzzy relation3. Fuzzy measures4. Fuzzy logic and approximate reasoning5. Fuzzy logic control system6. Feed-forward networks and supervised learning7. Unsupervised learning networks8. Recurrent neural networks9. Genetic algorithm10. Fuzzy neural integrated system11. Fuzzy neural controllers12. Applications

description.zh: 1.基礎傳輸線原理2.層狀材料電波傳播3.多導體傳輸特性4.傳輸線反射現象5.傳輸線時域響應6.傳輸線交談藕合7.印刷電路設計準則
description.en: 1.Transmission line fundamentals 2.Propagation in multilayerd transmission media 3.Analysis of multiconductortransmission lines 4.Reflections on transmission lines5.Transient analysis of transmission lines 6.Crosstalk on transmission lines 7.Printed circuit board design criteria

description.zh: 1.無線通訊簡介 2.IS-95CDMA系統介紹 3.智慧型天線系統簡介 4.智慧型天線於CDMA系統之應用 5.使用智慧型天線改進CDMA系統之效能6.向量傳播通道特性 7.適應性陣列信號演算法則 8.信號到達方向估測演算法則
description.en: 1.Introduction to Wireless Communications2.IS-95 PCS & Cellular CDMA3.Introduction to Smart Antennas4.Smart Antennas Techniques for CDMA5.CDMA System Range and Capaccity Improvement Using SpatialFiltering6.Characterization of Vector Propagation Channels7.Adaptive Algorithms8.Direction-of-Arrival Estimation Algorithms

description.zh: 以演講，討論，口頭及書面報告方式，探討土木與防災之相關課題，如結構檢測評估與補強，水土防災技術，防災體系與資訊，都市防災，消防防災，施工災變，環境防災規劃與管理等。
description.en: By means of adresses discussion,oral presentations and reports to learn and investigate the related civil and disaster prevention subjects, such as structure testing, evallution and repairing,soil and water disaster prevention.urban precaution,fire fighting,construction safety,enviromental planning and management for disaster prevention.

description.zh: 以結構工程、大地工程、防災科學、運輸交通、營建管理、營建材料及營建技術為專題討論主題之主要範疇。
description.en: SeminarSpecial subject discussion of structure engineering , geography engineering pretecting calamity science, transportation, construction management , construction material and construction technique.

name.en: Special Topics on Urban Disaster Prevention

description.zh: 介紹國內外"都市防災基本計畫"之沿革，內容；探討都市防災之規劃，設計；都市更新（災後重建）中防災的課題；防災生活圈與防災據點之設立原則。
description.en: Introduce the "Urban precaution basis plan"of Taiwan and other countries; Study the subjects regarding to city renewing or reduiding after the caution;discuss the principles to set up the living zones and preecaution bases for urban disaster prevention.

description.zh: 基礎施工過程中，常常容易造成災害的問題，為了預測土壤與結構物互制行為，以作為災害的預防之用，數值分析常被用來作為實務的預測。而數值分析的正確性又控制在土壤的應力應變強度關係(組合律)及變形的定義。本課程的內容係針對土壤的組合律(包含線性及非線性)作完整的介紹，以補全數值分析所欠缺的力學性質。
description.en: Numerical analysis has been used extensively to predict the behaviour of soil-structure interaction problem.The correctness of soil constitutive law .This course will introduce the properties of stress-strain-strength.how to predict the soil engineering behaviour.

name.en: Disaster Prevention Planning and Risk Management

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹有關災害發生的種類，以及相對應的災害預防規劃，並探討各種風險發生之機會，以進一步研擬危機緊急處計畫，以落實災害防治與減害的功效。
description.en: This course  will introduce the category, of disaster and each related preventing design.For deriving emergency treatment plan, the theory of rick management will be also discussed.

description.zh: 本課程說明受壓構件之挫屈及挫屈後之線性及非線性行為及分析。整體挫屈及局部挫屈亦分別探討，圖使學生建立結構穩定之整體觀念。
description.en: To demonstrate the linear and nonlinear behaviore as well as analysis of buckling and postbuckling problems for pressed members. Both overall and local buckling are investigated.It is aimed to established an integrated idea for students at structural stability.

description.zh: 使學生明瞭地震學基本理念及地震反應譜之運用，介紹結構物之耐震設計分析及實例探討，課程內容包括地震強度、地盤對地震之影響，耐震設計，結構物如公路、鐵路、港灣設施、橋樑、混凝土壩、拱壩及地下結構之震設計。
description.en: The main course include of earthquake intensity,influence of ground conditions on earthquake ground motion,design earthquake motion, earth pressure during earthquakes, earthquake resistance of roed,railways,bridges,concrote gravitydams, archdams and underground structures,ets.

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: This course provides the students opportunity to discuss after reading the IE related journals.  The goal is to improve students' research capabilities.

description.zh: 針對大學所習之廣義生產管理再作深入的闡述，一方面做公開的個案分析研討，以收進一步的學習之效，同時要求學生做實務專題研究
description.en: Production and operation management,case study and analysis,and independent study.

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討模擬學基本理論如模式化方法資料分析、分配之選定及判別、模擬進行、及結果分析。此外，相關文獻及運用領域將深入探討。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to study the fundamental of simulation,such as modeling approch, data analysis, selection and testing of distribution,simulations,and output analysis. Besides, the related literature reviews and applications areas will be focused.

description.zh: 介紹全面品管的意義、理念、重要性、範圍、實施條件、方法、工具，及管理手法，同時介紹如何克服實施中所遭遇的問題，及其預期成效
description.en: This course introduces the meaning, theory, importance, scope, implementing contraints, approaches, tools and management methods of TQM.  Besides, it also discusses how to overcome the problems during implementation and the expected effectiveness.

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討各種類型之神經網路，如逆傳遞網路，機率神經網路、學習向量量化網路、反傳遞網路、自述應共振理論、霍普菲爾網路、雙向聯想記憶網路、自組織映射圖網路等，此外相關文獻及運用之領域將深入討論。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to study the several ANN paradigm, such as Backpropagation, probability ANN, Counter-propagation, self-organization map. Hopfield network, BAN etc. Besides, the relative literature and applications will also cover.

description.zh: 以矩陣的表示法介紹迴歸的模式，其內容包括： ‧簡單線性迴歸-簡單線性迴歸模式，估計子的推論，模式的診斷 和估計子的同步推論 ‧一般線性迴歸 ‧變異數分析與迴歸模式 ‧案例討論
description.en: Use matrix approach to introduced the regression model which includes： 1.Simple Linear Regression--Simple Linear Regression model, Inferences of estimators in regression models, Diagnostics and simultaneous Inferences. 2.General Linear Regression 3.Analysis of Variance and Regression Analysis 4.Case study

description.zh: 介紹生產製造之影響因素，講授切削力學、工程材料、材料成型、塑性加工、粉末冶金…等等生產技術，然後探討高精密加工技術、半導體製造技術以及高速製造法。
description.en: Review of basic aspects of manufacturing engineering including driving forces, quality attributes, mechanical behavior, tolerances, etc. Examination of basic principles of mechanics, engineering materials, analysis of casting, bulk forming, sheet forming processes, plastics processing, powder processing, metal cutting, ultraprecision machining, high-speed machining and other related manufacturing

name.zh: 自動化組裝與接合系統
name.en: Automation of Assembly and Joining System

description.zh: 介紹以CAD, CAM, CIM技術將組裝與接合系統自動化，分析自動化後之組裝與接合系統之性能，深入暸解接合系統之設計與控制法，學習如何將機器手臂應用於組裝系統，探討零件設計製造與成品組裝之關係，最後將研究如何評估與改善自動化組裝與接合系統。
description.en: Review and explain what joining and assembly automation are, in the context of CAD, CAM, and CIM, and what tasks they can perform. Understand the basics of design and control of joining systems. Learn engineering techniques for selecting, planning and integrating industrial robotics and flexible assembly systems. Production and component design for ease of assembly. Existing product evaluation and redesign for improved assemblage.

description.zh: 物流有隱含供應鏈的觀念，物流管理係從供應商、製造商到最終顧客，整個配銷通路管理的整合性哲學。內容有物流構面、供應鏈、存貨決定、倉儲管理、運輸管理、訂單處理、資訊系統、全球物流等。
description.en: Logistics implies supply chain concept. Logistics management is an integrated philosophy to manage the total flow of distribution channel from supplier to ultimate customer. The course includes dimension of logistics, supply chain, inventory decision systems, global logistics.  through manufacturing systems design.

description.zh: 這門課敘述服務在經濟的角色、服務觀念和競爭策略，服務業的結構、服務的管理、世界級的服務和服務應用的量記模式。
description.en: This course describes the role of services in an economy . The service concept and competitive strategy , the structure of the service enterprise , the management of service operations , world-class service and quantitative models with service applications .

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討些最近發展之最佳化方法如模擬退火法，類種經網路，基因法則及塔布搜尋等。此外，相關之文獻及運用之領域將深入討論。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to study some new optimization methodologies,like simulated aunealing, neural networks,genetic algorithm, and Tabu search. Becises, the related literature reviews and applications areas wii be focused.

description.zh: 企業經營體制個案診斷，以診斷方式、技術、步驟及書面、口頭報告應如何撰寫。
description.en: This topic focus on the case study which based on diagnostic method, technique, skill, procedure, and reporting and presenting skill..

description.zh: 學習整體生產系統包括:設計資料、製造資訊、CAD/CAM及其它製造單元之整合，如何在效率與成本因素下安排製造法，以較快速與較低成本生產出高品質之產品，本課程亦將針對產品需求預測、生產計劃、品質控制、材料等管理問題深入探討。
description.en: Examination of the basic elements that are used to integrate the design and manufacture of capital and consumer products, manufacturing information systems, CAD/CAM systems, and manufacturability considerations when integrating unit process operations. How to plan and execute efficient and cost-effective manufacturing operations that produce high quality, and economical product. Study the demand forecasting, inventory planning, production scheduling, quality control, MRP, and project control.

description.zh: 本課程在探討服務系統傳遞作業之設計，服務業的經營管理原則，透過個案研究，發展出一套解決問題之技術。
description.en: Objectives of this course are (1)to learn the principles which guide the design and operation of service delivery system，(2)to study applications of these principles to many service firms，(3)to develop problem solving skills through cases and problem sets .

description.zh: 透過講課、討論、專題報告的方式，瞭解專案投資的擬定、決策分析、執行與評估方法，並探討不同因素對專案投資之影響，期提供良好的專案投資決策。
description.en: The objective of this course lies in definition of investment projects, investment decision-making, project execution and analysis methods. Various factors that affect the investment project decision problems are discussed to help decision maker properly resolves investment decision.

description.zh: 專題報告，專題演講，研究小組討論Case Study, Seminar
description.en: Case Study, Seminar

description.zh: 本課程從車輛的發展史出發，介紹車輛從性能的追求、低公害污染、省能源化、輕量化和環保政策等，到當今世界能源石化燃料危機以及原物料的短缺所衍生的問題，使未來車輛的研究發展條件更趨嚴苛。本內容讓學生了解在未來的車輛發展變遷下其所應具備的基本知識。
description.en: This course introduces the history of the vehicle development. This course contains numerous subjects as follow: vehicle performance, low pollutants, energy economy, light weight, environmental policy, etc. Students will understand the basic knowledge of the future vehicle development.

description.zh: 本課程介紹有限元素分析法基本原理及其在各種工程問題上之應用。包含有限元素分析法之基本觀念，利用變分原理建立有限元素模式，形狀函數及等參數元素，一維問題：桿、桁架、樑及骨架等，二維問題：平面應力應變及板殼問題。三維問題：一般實體，有限元素分析之計算機程式處理，有限元素分析於動態問題之應用，相關有限元素分析套裝軟體簡介
description.en: Introduction to the finite element method and its application to engineering problems.  Topics include Variational Formulation and Finite Element Formulations, 1-D, 2-D and 3-D Element Shapes, Numerical Integration, Applications to dynamic problem and Introduction to Commercial Finite Element Programs.

description.zh: 介紹振動模態分析的理論、實驗方法、感測器及儀器選用、量測信號的處理以及機械監測及診斷。
description.en: Topics include Theory of modal analysis, Experimental modal test, Transducers and instruments, Signal processing, Machine condition monitoring and diagnosis.

description.zh: 引擎及主要控制系統介紹，引擎動力系統之數學模式（含進氣系統、油路系統、點火系統、廢氣排放系統），閉迴路空燃比控制，爆震控制，引擎怠速之控制，引擎等速之控制，引擎加速／減速調整。
description.en: Introduction of Engine and Main Control System, Mathematical Model of Engine Dynamic System (Including Inlet System, Oil-Loop System, Ignition System, Exhaust System), Closed-Loop Air-Fuel Ratio Control, Detonation Control, Engine Idle Speed Control, Engine Cruising Speed Control, Engine Acceleration/Deceleration Regulation.

name.en: Special Topics on Internal Combustion Engines

description.zh: 進、排氣系統與空氣動力學，排放物與燃燒現象，循環模擬與分析，引擎性能調諧及控制，引擎噪音源與控制。
description.en: Gas Dynamics in Intake and Exhaust Manifold, Emissions and Related Combustion Phenomena, Cycle-Simulation and Analysis, Engine Performance Tuning and Control, Engine Noise Source and Its Control.

description.zh: 工程最佳化方法導論,線性規劃法,非線性規劃法,多目標函數最佳化,近代數學規劃法介紹,精密機電元件與系統之最佳設計。
description.en: Engineering optimization concepts,Linear progrsmming methods, Nonlinear programming Methods, Multi-objective optimization, Introduction to Modern mathematical programming techniques,Optimum design of precision machine components and systems.

description.zh: 包括10個數值問題: 1.簡單熱傳導 2.穩態圓柱熱傳問題 3.完全展開管流 4.異片對流展開管流 5.理想流體 6.突然澎脹壓縮流 7.自由對流完成展開流 8.軸對稱流 9.無限反應燃燒流場 10.亂流流場。
description.en: Including ten problems 1.Simple pure condition problem 2.Cylinderical condition for steady non uniform flow 3.Fully develop duct 4.Fin conduction convectionfor full develop 5.Ideal flow 6.Sudden expansion compressible 7. Free convective flow for fully develop 8. Axial symmetry flow 9. Infinitely combustion reaction 10.Turbulent flow.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 冷凍設計、庫體設計、保溫與防漏設計、熱負荷計算、溫濕度控制、除霜設計與控制、氣流設計、性能分析
description.en: Refrigeration design, structure design, insulation and vapor barrier design, heat load calculation, temperature and humidity control, defrost design and control, airflow design, performance analysis

description.zh: 先修課程︰熱傳學本課程主要針對冷凍系統隔熱與熱傳技術作更深入探討，學生以修習過大學部" 熱傳學" 三學分之課程，本課程主要闡述︰1. 熱傳導理論2. 隔熱材料性質3. 真空保溫技術4. 真空保溫材料性質5. 冷凍系統隔熱設計
description.en: The main objective of this course is to offer a postgraduate level of the knowledge of insulation technology for a refrigeration system.The course includes the following subjects:1. Theory of heat conduction 2. The property of insulation materials3. Outline of vacuum insulation technology  4. The property of vacuum insulation materials5. Design of insulation for refrigeration systems.

description.zh: 現代能源工程技術，決定製程成本，故如何統合有效率的能源管理技術是決定產品競爭力之關鍵，本課程主要內容為︰1. 能源成本控制2. 區域型電力能管理策略3. 能源系統的經濟性設計概念4. 冷暖系統的檢測與分析5. 總合能源操作的工程化資料收集6. 新能源系統的生態模組化設計
description.en: At the completion of this course, students will be able to several factors:1. Compare and contrast the various forms of energy conversion.2. Examine the technologies used to convert chemical energy into mechanical energy.3. Apply the concepts of electrical converters.4. Evaluate the major types of energy storage.5. Determine how human values affect the success of energy conservation.6. Design of new energy system modules with ecology considerations.

description.zh: 實驗是進行科學與工程研究不可或缺的工具，實驗方法的設計與實驗數據的分析更是決定實驗結果品質優劣的關鍵，本課程將介紹實驗過程所必須具備的各項知識，以數據的量測與分析為開始，並介紹量測各類物理量的感測元件，如壓力、溫度、流量及聲波等，以建立學生具備實驗量測的基礎。課程主要內容包含有基本量測、量測標準、量測單位、訊號讀取、資料簡報、數據的準確性與變異性、類比訊號量測、數位訊號量測、系統響應、感測器。
description.en: Introduction of Experiment and Measurement MethodExperiment is the essential tool for the research of science and engineering. The design of experiment and the analysis of data are the keys of the high quality of experiment. The course will introduce the materials of experiment and measurement. The procedures of measurement and the analysis method of data will be detailed investigated. And then the sensors to measure the interested physical parameters of pressure, temperature, flow rate and acoustic will be introduced. The technology of measurement and analysis of experiment will be built up in the course. The contents of the course are basic measurement, standards of measurement, dimension of measurement, access data, data presentation, accuracy and uncertainty of data, analog signal measurement, digital signal measurement, system response, and sensors.

description.zh: 本課程主要包含四部份，分別為基本有限差分法、流體力學與熱傳方程式的有限差分法應用、有限體積法、格點產生法。
description.en: This course comprises four parts. Part one is fundamentals of finite-difference methods. Part 2 is the application of finite-difference methods to the equations of fluid mechanics and heat transfer. Part 3 is finite-volume method. Part 4 is grid generation.

description.zh: 從闡述各種汽車共生系統在特定的工業製程，商業智慧型大樓或大學校園區域網路型式等能源有效利用的整合規劃設計，主要課程內容為： 1.汽車共生系統概念 2.熱力循環的技術理論 3.多元化的原動機利用 4.複合循環發電廠 5.都會型汽電共生利用 6.汽電共生的能源管理 7.汽電共生的環境管理 8.各種熱電轉換裝置 9.高級能源轉換科技之汽電共生
description.en: By studying this course, the following terms can be identified, defined, used: 1.The Concept of Cogeneration system 2.Theory of Cogeneration Technology. 3.Combined cycles plant. 4.Heating and cooling integration with power generation. 5.The Design Concept and Demonstrated economic performance of cogen. sys. 6.Social and Environmental management of cogen. sys. 7.Conversion Method and Technology on advanced system.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹化學儲能裝置和儲冷系統之基礎與實務。課程內容包括：(一)儲能裝置理論與技術：電池儲能系統與模組、轉換器，各式燃料電池，如燐酸電池，質子交換電池等。(二)儲冷系統理論與技術：儲冰水式系統，各式儲冰系統如全凍結式、冰盤管式、冰泥式、動態製冰式、優態鹽及冰球式等。
description.en: This course including two parts:electrochemical energy storage/conversion theory and technology, and thermal storage system fundamental and technology:Electric cell engergy conversion system and module, transformer and fuel cells such as phosphatic cell and proton-exchanging chilled water systemand ice storage systems such as total freeze-up, ice-on-coil,ice slurry, dynamic ice builder, eutectic salt and ice ball systechnology will also be covered.  The advanced PCM for thermal storage will be investigated as a hint to the students.

description.zh: 空調中央監控系統之規劃設計。課程內容含設備運轉之操作管理，配合電力尖峰負載控制節電管理，能源有效利用控制，溫度、濕度、環境因子之監測及操控，故障監測維修控制等，並介紹空調系統運轉最佳化之方法。
description.en: This course is focused on the design and planning of central monitoring system for HVAC controls. The contents are the operating management of equipment, effective energy usage, temperature/humidity/environmental factors monitoring and control. The optimal methods applied in the operation of HVAC are also included.

description.zh: 熱交換器設計方法、單向對流熱傳計算、壓差計算、冷凝器與蒸發器分析、殼管式熱交換器分析、密集式熱交換器分析、濕盤管理論分析
description.en: Design methods, forced convection correlations for single phase heat exchange, pressure calculation, condensers and evaporators analysis, shell and tube heat exchanger analysis, compact heat exchanger analysis, wet coil analysis.

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在尋求以數量模式求出相關作業問題之最佳解，並介紹學生瞭解作業研究的本質，數量規畫方法及機率型態問題等。本課程包括下列主題：線型規畫、網路分析、動態規畫、遊戲理論、整數規畫、非線型規畫、馬可夫鏈、等候線理論、存貨理論、預測、馬可夫決策過程、可靠度、決策分析及系統模擬等。
description.en: Linear programming、network analysis、dynamic programming、game theory、(non)Integer linear programming、markov chains (markovian decision process)、queueing theory、inventory models、forecasting models、decision analysis and system simulation

name.en: Seminar of Services Marketing and Management

description.zh: 本課程主要研討服務行銷與管理，內容包括：（1）服務分類（2）服務接觸（3）服務品質（4）服務環境（5）服務失誤（6）服務補救（7）服務策略（8）顧客滿意（9）顧客價值管理（10）服務定價。
description.en: The course mainly discusses concepts of services marketing and management. The contents will include following topics：（1）classification of services, （2）the service encounter, （3）service quality,（4）servicescape, （5）service failure, （6）service recovery, （7）service strategies, （8）customer satisfaction, （9）customer value management,（10）service pricing.

description.zh: 一.發展商務決策系統，包括：1.DSS架構 2.DSS硬體 3.DSS軟體 4.DSS模式 5.GDSS模式 二、資料倉儲 三、智慧型代理人 四、資訊分享 五、OLAP 六、OLTP 七、Sales force automation
description.en: Development and application of decision support systems for commerce including DSS architecture, hardware, software tools, models in DSS and group DSS. Recent development and application of intelligent systems including data warehousing, intelligent agent, information sharing, on-line analysis processing and sales force automation using Web technologies. Development of an intelligent commerce system using Microsoft SQL Server.

description.zh: 本課程旨在針對流通業中各項經營管理項目作探討，其中包含設施位置選定，人力資源，流通規劃，及銷售促進等。此外，商用地理資訊系統之應用及個案研討亦包含在此課程中。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to study the required management issues of retail business，such as location selection，human resource ，retail planning ，and marketing etc。Besides，at also includes business GIS and case study。

description.zh: 本課程包含資料庫行銷之基本內容及未來發展，聯合資料庫，供應目標對象，可預測模組及決策支援等。
description.en: This course includes the fundamental theory of database marketing and its future development, consolidated database, offer targetting, predictive modeling and decision support.

description.zh: 使電腦系統具有解決問題的能力、智慧的表現及儲存的型態、理解及辨識的能力、及視覺、聽覺、觸覺及表達的能力、並有學習、認知、分析理解等能力。
description.en: Made computer the power of problem solving, intelligent behavior and storage type, comprehension and distinguish abilities. The abilities of vision, hearing, touching, learning, identifying, analyzing are also the target of the course.

name.zh: 組織學習與行銷知識管理
name.en: Organizational Learning and Marketing Knowlege Management

description.zh: 本課程以理論為出發點，分析組織學習在行銷管理中資訊處理與知識管理的角色，課程主題包括,組織學習，組織創新，市場導向理論, 顧客價值管理理論,知識管理概論,行銷知識創造與轉移知識管理個案,知識管理與資訊技術。
description.en: This course will analysis how organizational learning impacts on the marketing information process and knowledge management. It will include the followings: organizational learning, innovation, market-orientation, and customer value management, marketing knowledge management.

description.zh: 多變量分析及處理二項以上變項的統計，分析技術、常用于管理，經濟，財務，會計等之分析‧課程內容：因素分析、主成份分析、複迴歸分析、區別分析、多變項異數分析典型相關分析、集群分析、聯合分析、直線方程式模式
description.en: Multivariate analysis is to analyze more then two variables simultaneously, and to be able to apply to management, economics, accounting…etc.The contents of the course:factor analysis, principal component analysis, multiple regression analysis, multiple discriminate analysis, multiple analysis of variance, canonical correlation analysis, cluster analysis, conjoint analysis, SEM…etc.

description.zh: 介紹資訊整合與交換的概念。藉由作業程序的改造及資訊技術與標準的運用，將業務上所必要的資訊電子化，標準化，以建立全球共通商業系統的無紙作業環境
description.en: Introduce the idea of information integration and exchange for the commercial environment. Also, by applying the business procedure re-engineering and information technology to establish necessary standard for paperless commercial environment.

description.zh: 企業經營體制個案診斷，以診斷方式、技術、步驟及書面、口頭報告應如何撰寫。
description.en: This topic focus on the case study which based on diagnostic method, technique, skill, procedure, and reporting and presenting skill..

description.zh: 本課程包含：企業環境變化，組織改造之時機及企業內部之因應，企業流程再造之案例及流程實習。
description.en: This course includes: the change of business environment, the timing and process of organizational reengineering, the response and solution of organization during reengineering, the case study and practice.

description.zh: 建立學生對各類顧客關係管理相關議題之基礎理論架構觀念，奠定學生日後從事顧客關係管理分析研究工作時之需。課程中將以個案實例為主，並配合各種資料探勘套裝軟體，以應用的觀點使學生更容易接受了解線上分析、資料倉儲與資料探勘分析的功用。
description.en: This course includes the fundamental theory of data mining techniques and the various applications in different enterprises. These techniques will include classification, association rule, forecasting, pattern recognition, etc.

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程為沿續教育統計學（一）課程，探討教育問題進階研究，所需之統計理論與方法。課程內容含卡方檢定法、多因子變異數分析、趨向分析、共變數分析、因素分析及無母數統計考驗等。
description.en: This course focuses on application of statistical principles and methods. Course contains include Chi-square techniques, multivariate analysis of variance, trend analysis, covariance analysis, factor analysis and nonparametric tests.

description.zh: 技職教育相關法令、大學法、師資培育法、教師法、教育人員任用條例...等主要法令；教育人員法律素養、公文基本概念、習作與處理。
description.en: Knowledge of current case law and legislation, sensitivity to legal issues, application to legal principles related to education services in school.

name.en: Research in Planning of Information Instruction

description.zh: 研究多媒體及電腦系統在資訊教學之應用，並規劃技職學校資訊普及教學，資訊專業教學，資訊應用教學的實施策略與內涵．
description.en: Knowledge in the application of multimedia and computer systems in information instruction. Exploration of the planning of information instruction in technical-vocational education, including the implementation strategies and content of information universality instruction, information specialty instruction, and information application instruction.

name.zh: 技職教育學生輔導研究
name.en: Studies in Guidance to Vocational Education Students

description.zh: 當代輔導主要理論、技職教育學生特質、生涯發展與規劃、職業輔導相關問題研討。
description.en: The contents include The Theories of Contemporary Counseling, Characters of Vocational Education Students, Career Planning and Development. Topics will cover a wide range of profession counseling, Job-placement, and student services.

description.zh: 當代教育評鑑理論與模式，各國教育評鑑組織與實施策略比較，我國教育評鑑相關問題探討。
description.en: This course is designed to enable graduate level students to develop the skills and strategies necessary for education evaluation and improvement of on-gring programs. Included will be a historical review of the field and an analysis of approaches to education evaluation, both traditional and innovative.

name.en: Research in the Economics of Education

description.zh: 縱覽教育經濟學理論基礎，研習教育經濟研究方法論，主題探討包含:台灣經濟成功的要件，經濟政策與發展軌跡及高科技的挑戰，重要論點在於如何結合技職教育融入台灣新興產業要求。
description.en: Overview of theories and research methodology in the economics of education. Topics include elements of success economic policies, economic policies, economic development, and challenges of hi-tech era in Taiwan, and discussion of issues on what elements impact Taiwan's economic development and how to combine the technical-vocational education with the development of Taiwan's new industry.

name.en: Research in the Society of Education

description.zh: 縱覽教育社會學理論基礎，研習教育社會研究方法論，主題探討包含:技職教育與社會發展及社會心理學，重要論點在於如何透過教育社會學觀點，針對當前技職教育問題提出建議。
description.en: Overview of theories and research methodology in the society of education. Topics include collaboration between social development and technical-vocational education, social psychology and analysis of conclusion or implications underlying from major research in the society of education to solve current issues of the technical-vocational education.

name.zh: 技職教育教學策略研究
name.en: Studies in Instructional Strategies for Technical-Vocational

description.zh: 對有效教學、認知教學、教學前策略、動機引發與持續、      概念教學、原則教學、技能教學等策略探討研究。
description.en: Course Title: Studies in Instructional Strategies for technical -Vocational Education Course Description: The course is designed to enable students to develop the skills and strategies necessary for instruction in Technical - Vocational school system. Included will be a historical review of the field and an analysis of approaches to instruction, both traditional and innovative.

description.zh: 探討我國技職教育發展的背景、組織及影響；西洋技職教育的發展沿革、歷程、關鍵人物及其影響之研究。
description.en: To study the historical development of Vocational-Technical Education (VTE) in major country; focusing on educational background. system and individuals influencing VTE.

description.zh: 技職教育哲學問題與探討、知識教育問題與研討、道德教育問題與研討、美感教育問題與研討、通識教育問題與研討、哲學名著報告與研討。
description.en: This course is a survey of philosophies and philosophic issues that are relevant to the educational profession. It highlights the relationship between philosophic points and educational outcomes between theory and practice.

name.zh: 人力資源發展專題研究
name.en: Special Topics in Human Resource Development

description.zh: 研究生探討主題可針對當前人力資源發展重要課題，挑選有興趣之子題研擬，心得報告於課堂中研討。
description.en: Exploration of concepts and current issues underlying from major research in human resource development.  Discussion, selected topics research, and reporting in class are required.

description.zh: 研究生提出學校行領域有關的個人構想計劃書，經由個別化指導，可以深入探討新的發現並提出研究心得報告。
description.en: An individualized study program is planned for graduate students and guided by a professor. The students have to offer the proposal of specific topical interests and conceptual frameworks in educational administration Analysis of current issues and conclusion or implications underlying major research in educational administration.

description.zh: 研究生依據個人基礎:透過個別化指導，就其興趣對教育哲學領域，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of theories, trends and research in educational philosophy. An individualized study program is planned to develop the skills and research for graduate students and guided by a professor.

description.zh: 研究生透過個別化的學習方式，就其興趣對技職教育課程的評鑑原理與實務領域，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of current issues, theories, and research in curriculum evaluation of technical-vocational education. An individualized study program is planned to develop the skills and research for graduate students and guided by a professor.

description.zh: 研究生提出產學合作領域有關的個人構想計劃書，經由個別化指導，可以深入探討新的發現並提出研究心得報告。
description.en: An individualized study is planned for graduate students and guided by a professor. The students have to offer the proposal of specific topical interests and conceptual frameworks in enterprise cooperative program. Analysis of current issues and conclusion or implications underlying major research in enterprise cooperative program through independent, directed study.

name.zh: 獨立研究--校園設施與空間規劃

description.zh: 研究生透過個別化的學習方式，就其興趣對技職教育校園設施與空間規劃，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
description.en: Individual study or research for graduate student in planning of facility and school settings in technical-vocational education. Building research competencies and analysis of the current issues in planning of facility and school settings in technical-vocational education for students is the guide theme of this course.

name.zh: 獨立研究--人力資源發展

description.zh: 研究生提出人力資源發展領域有關的個人構想計劃書，經由個別化指導，可以深入探討新的發現並提出研究心得報告。
description.en: An individualized study is planned for graduate students and guided by a professor. The students have to offer the proposal of specific topical interests and conceptual frameworks in human resource development. Analysis of current issues and conclusion/implications underlying major research in human resource development through independent, directed study.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討各種高分子之聚合方法及動力學之研究，如逐步聚合、遊離基連鎖聚合、乳化聚合、離子連鎖聚合、連鎖共聚合反應、開環聚合、立體規則高分子之合成，未終止的游離基聚合方法。從分子量的分佈，結構物性之關係，作高分子聚合之最佳化設計，並且探討這些聚合方法如何應用在最新的科技上，如光電材料、複合材料。
description.en: This course is to elucidate the polymer synthesis and Kinetics studies. The synthesis includes step polymerization, free radical chain polymerization, emulsion polymerization, ionic chain polymerization, chain copolymerization, ring opening polymerization, sterospecific polymerization and living free radical polymerization. The synthesis scheme is optimized with the structure-properties relationship and molecular design. The potential application of these methods in high-tech materials, such as optoelectronics, and composites, will be elucidated.

description.zh: 本課程以高分子加工時所遇到之問題，分單元講述，其內容包括：(I) 高分子加工學之基礎(a)輸送現象(b)高分子黏彈學(c)高分子混煉。(II)高分子加工學之應用(a)壓模法(b)沖模法(c)反應沖模法(d)絲線成形  等專題。
description.en: The course focuses on the "trouble shooting" in the polymer processing . Both theoretical and practical topics will be included. The main contents are devided into the following units :(I)Fundamental Studies:(a)Transport Phenomena (b)Viscoelastic Properties of  Polymer Melt (c)Polymer Compounding and Blending.(II)Practical Studies:(a)Compression Molding (b)Injection Molding (c)Reaction Injection Molding (d)Fiber Formation (e)Membrane      Formation.

description.zh: 為使學生對高分子物理有所認識，本課程之設定將涵蓋所有高分子物理之相關課題，其主要內容分以下兩大部份(I)高分子之非結晶性質(II)高分子之結晶性質。而兩大部份中，又各分以下數單元講述:(I) 高分子之非結晶性質(a) 高分子鏈之機率結構(b) 分子鏈之運動方式(c) 高分子熱力學(d) 自由體積理論(含Tg ,Tα,Tβ,Tγ之探討)(e) WLF經通曲線(II)高分子之結晶性質(a) 結晶晶格之分析(b) 高分子結晶度及順向度之估計(c) 結晶度對高分子機械性質，導電性質，及熱性質之影響(d) 溶液晶體與熔融晶體之比較(e) 熱結晶及張力結晶之比較
description.en: This course is designed to make students theroughly understand the problems related to polymer physics. The main content will include two major topics:(I)Amorphous Polymer(II)Crystalline Polymer.The detailed items included in the course are:(I) Amorphous Polymer (a) Random-Walk Theory for Chain Configuration(b) Chain Conformation and Movements(c) Polymer Thermodynamics(d) Free Volume Theory (including the study on Tg ,Tα,Tβ,Tγ…etc.)(e) WLF Master Curve(II)Crystalline Polymer(a) Unit Cell Analysis(b) Polymer Crystallinity and Orientation Measurement(c) Effect of Crystallinity on Mechanical, Dielectrical, and Thermal Properties of Polymeric Materials (d) Solution Crystals vs. Melt Crystals(e) Thermal Induced Nucleation vs. Stress Induced Nucleation.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討高分子用於光電工業的原理及方法。主要分為�電子構裝高分子?電路成像高分子?光電子成像材料?最近的光電新材料。包括用於光碟、電變色、非線性光學、LB薄膜、發光二極體材料，導電及半導電高分子。本課程探討這些材料的合成方法，應用原理以及對未來的展望，作詳細的探討。
description.en: This course is to elucidate the synthesis and application of polymer in optoelectronics.It includes�polymer for electron package?polymer for photoresist?polymer for photoimaging?The advanced material of optics disc, electronic chromic, nonlinear optics, LB film, organic photodiode,and conducting polymer.The synthetic scheme of these material and their application will be fully discussed.

description.zh: 染顏料(色料)雖已發展百餘年，唯部分現象與實驗結果仍須進一步的研究以獲得完整正確的解釋。本課程主要探討染料的吸收光譜與其分子結構式的關係，是為具有色料化學與有機化學基礎的同學所設計的。
description.en: Although studies on synthetic colourants have been performed for more than 100 years, their detailed elucidation requires further extensive research.This course reviews the absorption features of organic dyes and recent progress in their explanation in terms of molecular structure. This course is mainly intended for organic chemists and colour chemists which are interested in the spectral characteristics of dyes and their conceptual understanding.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討界面的物理化學現象及其在高科技之應用。包括有(1) 表面及界面張力的分子理論(2)界面的作用力(3)表面及界面的熱力學(4)液體和固體界面的熱力學(5)表面及界面張力的測量(6)接觸角的測量(7)吸附的熱力學(8)分散液的穩定性(9)分散液分子間吸力及斥力(10)懸浮液之高分子穩定性(11)凝聚(12)界面科學在高科技及光電工業上之原理及應用。
description.en: This course is to elucidate the interfacial phenomena and its application in high-tech Industries. It includes (1)molecular theory of surface and interface (2)molecular interaction of interface (3)thermodynamics of surface and interfaces (4)thermodynamics of liquids in contact with solids (5)measurement of surface and interfacial tension (6)contact angle measurement (7)thermodynamics of adsorption (8)stability of dispersion (9)molecular interaction of dispersion (10)stability of suspension (11)flocculation(12)application of interface science in High-tech industries

description.zh: 課程從統計模式(迴歸分析)、概率、再進入隨遇變數、概率分佈、分佈曲線種類、樣品分佈、統計評估及統計測試等核心。
description.en: The contents of this course are statistical modeling (regression analysis)、probability, random variables and probability distributions, important probability distribution in engineering, sampling  distributions, statistical estimation and statistical testing.

name.en: A Briefing on Architecture Design Course (II)

description.zh: 總課程目標：     在學員原有專業基礎上，增加其深度與廣度，包含自實質與非      實質環境之探討與實踐等之能力。 研二課程目標：     透過設計課題培養自實質至非實質環境與實踐之總體操作能力      ，其深度與廣度將是評價判準。 課程概要：     就各學員所選定課題完成一設計成果及完整探討與實踐之過程      書面資料，以接受目標檢驗。
description.en: Goal for the Course :    Base on the professional knowledge, the disciples learn   to enhance the depth and width of ascertainment and   practice in both substantial and non-substantial   environments. 2nd Grade Through different design topics, the disciples   accomplish the course goal－enhancing the ability of   general manipulation and practice in both substantial and   non-substantial environments. A complete presentation,   which includes design result and a report of the process   of ascertainment, will be required for evaluation. The   evaluation will emphasize on the depth and width of   ascertainment and practice.

description.zh: 本課程區分為四個實習，共一學年之都市設計實習，每學期應從事幾項實習，依該學期之情況而定：(一)大型基地開發之建築規劃與都市設計實習：參照台北市都市發展局擬定之「都市設計與土地使用開發許可」之審議標準，練習建築、敷地與都市設計三者整合關係之設計實習。(二)都市更新地區都市設計實習：以台北市更新地區為範例，選定基地範圍從事都市更新地區之改造，建立地區未來像，並擬定都市設計準則。(三)都市計畫通盤檢討地區都市設計實習：依據都市計畫通盤檢討第八條規定，都市計畫通盤檢討地區必須依據該地區之交通、產業、文化、生態及基地等因素，擬定都市設計準則；以台北市都市計畫通盤檢討為例，練習都市設計準則之訂定，或以都市計畫細部計畫為例，研擬土地使用分區管制與設計準則。(四)新發展區都市設計實習：選定一個地區，可能是擴大都市發展地區或新市鎮、新社區之規劃設計實習。
description.en: There are four exercises for one academic year. The exercises to be undertaken  depend on when and how it is appropriate:(4)	Exercise on building planning and urban design for large-scale land development project(5)	Exercise practice on urban design for district renewal planning(6)	Exercise of overall review district urban design out of the total urban design	(4)	Exercise on urban design for new development area

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在研究目前環境議題與強化有關環境規劃設計的理論與經驗，以及增進對環境整體規劃與設計可能途徑的瞭解。故本課程主要內容包括：一、緒論二、環境決策三、環境保護政策四、永續發展五、達到良好環境規劃與設計的可能途徑六、環境規劃與設計的專業實務練習七、結論
description.en: The purpose of this course is to explore the nature of current environmental issues, and further our knowledge about current theories and experiences with the various approaches to environmental planning and design. Our hope is to improve planning and design practice. To examine these concerns, the course includes:1.Introduction2.Environmental decision-making3.Environmental protection policy4.Sustainable development5.Alternative approaches to environmental planning and design.6.Professional practice of environmental planning and design7.Conclusions

description.zh: 建築和都市的歷史, 理論, 和批評中的課題研究一.現代的 建築二.美國的 建築三.東方的四.建築師五.歷史保存六.技術的,構造的, 和程式性的主題討論。 七.本土建築
description.en: Topical studies in history, theory, and criticism of architecture and urban.J.Pre-ModernK.ModernL.AmericanM.OrientalN.ArchitectsO.Historic PreservationP.Technical, Structural, and ProgrammaticQ.Urban DesignR.Vernacular Architecture

description.zh: 本課程主要在探討如何結合硬體建設與柔性需求的社區規劃，以創造理性生活空間。並從都市規劃設計、公共安全、社區結構過程與社區組織等不同層面聯繫建築與都市設計議題，探討社區發展問題與對策。課程內容主要包括：1.社區定義、相關理論、形成、類型、環境問題及改善策略。2.社區建設與發展之規劃主題。3.社區鄰里單元規劃、土地細分與計畫整合單元開發、國民住宅社區  規劃。4.社區管理與維護。5.社區規劃/社區營造與民眾參與。6.社區規劃與社區文化、生活品質及防災。7.社區規劃實務：實例探討。
description.en: This course is mainly to discuss the way of community planning is          concerned with achieving a between physical creativity and well-being of   the community and to explore the development issues and strategies to cope with. Thus the course including : 8.Definitions, theories, genesis and morphology of the community.9.Issues and strategies of community development and planning.10.Neighborhood nuit planning land subdivision and unit development planning and public housing community planning ..etc11.Management and maintenance of community.12.Community planning development and public participation.13.Community planning and culture living quality as well as public safety.14.Community planning practice.

name.en: Theory and Practice of Landscape Ecological Planning

description.zh: 景觀生態學是以生態學理論來理解並建立一套可以認知景觀與其中的生物﹑非生物環境關係的學科。有關景觀的生態規劃理論基本上是將這一系列景觀生態學模型或原理作為設計指標而形成的一套規劃操作理論。景觀生態原理在景觀學科中具有極其根本的角色，不僅在景觀資源保育與管理上提供極具價值的參考；對於景觀規畫與設計實務者更提供了在不同尺度範疇狀況下三向度空間設計的形態準則。因此，課程涵蓋了從區域、基地和細部設計三種尺度的設計內涵，講述及操作在基於不同目的的需求時，人為景觀如何介入自然環境，以及導入的人為景觀的設計準則。 1. 景觀生態與形態理論 2. 景觀生態設計理論 3. 景觀生態規劃理論的應用 a. 都市地區和鄉村地區 b. 區域、基地和細部設計尺度
description.en: Landscape ecology seeks for principles and models that contribute to dealing with conservation, management, and planning in landscape practice. The course "Landscape Theory and Practice of Ecological Planning" refers to those principles and models established in landscape ecology and then applies to landscape planning and design. Issues relates to this courses are listed as follows; 1. Landscape Ecology and landscape morphology 2. Ecological planning theory 3. The application of ecological theory in landscape practice a. Urban region and countryside b. Macro-sale, meso-sale, and micro-scale

name.en: The Monograph on Cultural Heritage Conservation

description.zh: 為強化建築專業領域對文化資產與歷史保存之概念與實務推展，本課程將以台灣相關歷史保存議題作為探討之主軸。1.現行文化資產保存法之現況與問題（一）2.現行文化資產保存法之現況與問題（二）3.都市計畫與歷史保存4.台灣歷史保存運動5.歷史保存個案討論（一）6.歷史保存個案討論（二）7.都市保存與地方再發展策略8.社區、民間組織與歷史保存9.私有古蹟與發展權移轉10.921 震災後的文化資產保存工作11.日韓等國文化資產保存法令比較12.考古遺址保存13.歷史保存與文化論述的建構14.傳統匠師與古蹟修復制度之建立
description.en: Course Structure and Content:1.	Philosophy and Politics of Conservation 2.	Conservation Law and Practice 3.	Conservation Economics 4.	Comparative Cultural Policy 5.	Case Studies 6.	Urban Conservation and Redevelopment7.	Civic Organization in Conservation8.	On Archaeological Relics9.	Historic Conservation and Cultural DiscoursePrivate Properties in Conservation

description.zh: 本課程主要為討論台灣地區建築上的風土特色，以及本地各歷史階段之建築回應此特質所提供的建築成就或特色。
description.en: This course explores the vernacular character of Taiwanese architecture and architectural achievement and characteristics in response to the character during respective historical periods.

description.zh: 進階的軟、硬體應用與技術的介紹。課程內容主要集中於設計理論的思考過程與現有最新的電腦輔助設計等相關軟硬體間的密切關係; 例如, 如何利用適當的現有最新設備技術之結合並運用於設計過程的創造和表現。
description.en: Advanced media techniques.  It is organized in two related areas: Computer Aided Design and Design Theory.  Computer Aided Design focuses on the use and development of computational tools in the service of design.  Design Theory focuses on the conceptual and formal ideas associated with computation and deals with their application and development.  Students also utilize computer aided sequence manipulation and image compositing tools in the production of multimedium-multilayered video.

name.en: An Advanced study on green Building

description.zh: 一、教學目標：1.	學習且體認國內外綠建築、環境共生建築及永續經營建築之課題與本質。研討國內外對其課題之解決方法，並培養研擬課題與本土化規劃設計方法之能力。二、教學內容：1.	綠建築、環境共生建築、永續建築之內涵。2.	研討地球環境、人類生活環境及建築環境之相互關係。3.	研討環境共生與綠建築之本質。4.	研討綠建築與生命週期各階段之環境課題。5.	研討國內外綠建築規劃、設計技術及解決方法。6.	研討綠社區、綠都市之發展規劃。
description.en: 1.	The contect of Green Building, Symbiosis Building and Sustainable Building.2.	Study of relation between globe environment, hurman life environment and architecture environment.3.	The nature of  Green Building and Symbiosis Building.4.	The discussion of Green Building and Life Cycle.5.	The technology and method of Green Building Planning.6.	The Planning of Green Community and Green City.

description.zh: 為使都市安全防災的理論與實務能相互結合，特別以921震災後之重建為主題，作為實務訓練，所以本課程授課主要內容分為三部分：第一部份為都市防災概論，此部分主要針對國內外文獻作一回顧，進而瞭解都市防災整體架構，區分為（1）文獻回顧；（2）防災基本計畫；及（3）防災整體架構等。第二部份為都市與都市計畫防災，此部分從防災理論著手，逐漸導入都市計畫防災實務，最後提出防災都市計畫作業的方式與內容，期使國內都市計畫能逐步邁向防災都市計畫，以建立『安全都市』為目標。此部分的主要內容區分為：（1）都市災害風險理念的形成；（2）防災都市計畫與地區防災系統規劃；（3）都市計畫防災系統規劃原則；（4）都市計畫防災作業準則內容架構；（5）都市計畫防災作業準則；（6）安心都市計畫的形成與實現。第三部分為實務操作部分，以草屯鎮為例，藉九二一大地震的實例，深入探討災情調查的方法，實際調查狀況及研訂災後重建的程序與計畫內容，期望成為國內都市重建計畫的範例，主要內容區分為：（1）緒論；（2）重建理論；（3）草屯鎮現況發展；（4）災情調查方法與重建程序之建立；（5）災情調查分析與重建計畫內容研訂等。
description.en: The subject will be presented in three partsPart One - (1) Literature retrospection; (2) Fundamental planning for disaster prevention; (3) An integrated disaster prevention organization.Part Two -The major contents to be addressed include (1) Formation of urban disaster cataclysm and risk; (2) Urban disaster prevention plan and regional disaster protection system planning; (3) Principles for planning disaster prevention system in urban plan; (4) Operational standards and organization for urban disaster prevention; (5) Operational guidelines for urban disaster prevention; (6) Realization and formation of trouble free urban plan.Party Three -. The major contents are (1) Introduction; (2) rehabilitation theory; (3) Current development in Tsaotun City; (4) Establishment of damage survey method and rehabilitation procedures; (5) Detail analysis of damage survey report and preparation of rehabilitation plan content

description.zh: 本課程主要在探討台灣地區從日據時期至民國八十年代都市規劃範型的演變，內容包括各歷史階段中的經濟、社會及政治背景的主要特徵，以及對應在都市規劃作業上的實際狀況。並藉由案例分析，使學生更深入認識都市規劃的本質及其背後各種支配力量和限制因素。
description.en: The course mainly explores the urban planning history during last one hundred years in Taiwan. The changing paradigms and the social, economic, and political contexts of each time period are discussed.In addition, many planning cases are analyzed to obtain the better ideas of what the characteristics of urban planning, the dominated powers behind, and the limitations are.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。   1.多模光纖實驗 2.單模光纖實驗 3.位置量測實驗 4.Doppler測速實驗 5.全像術 6.全像干涉術 7.疊紋術 8.疊紋干涉術 9.電腦輔助雷射切割程式製作 10.雷射切割實驗 11.快速原型三D加工NC程式製作 12.雷射輔助快速原型製造 13.基本光電週邊實習 13-1.光資訊輸入：數位相機、掃瞄器、影像捕抓 13-2.光資訊輸出 14.光資訊儲存實習 14-1.MO的用法與控制 14-2.CD/RW的用法與控制 15.基本光資訊處理實習 15-1.光計算圖形辨認實習 15-2.MRI醫學影像處理
description.en: 1.Experiment on multi-mode optical fiber 2.Experiment on single-mode optical fiber 3.Position measurement 4.Doppler velocity measurement 5.Holography 6.Holography interferometry 7.Moire method 8.Moire interferometry 9.Computer assisted programming for laser cutting 10.Experiment of laser cutting 11.NC programming for the three dimensional fabricator of rapid prototype 12.Laser assisted rapid prototyping 13.Basic Electro-optical peripheral  13-1.Optical Input devices：digital camera、scanner、Image capturer  13-2.Optical output devices：LCD display、LED display、3D-TV display 14.Optial information storage  14-1.Usage and control of MO  14-2. Usage and control of CD/RW 15.Dasic optical information processing  15-1.Optical compating and pattern recognition  15-2.MRI medical image processing

description.zh: 先修課程：電磁學、工程數學、近代物理。   由電磁學之理論推展光波之運行，並經由近代物理之量子論推導出之原子及分子能階與固態晶體之能帶理論，加以說明電磁波與物質間之作用。介紹共振腔、活化性介質及各種雷射之激發形式等雷射三個基本組成。並針對雷射光之種類、特性及其應用，加以說明。
description.en: Combining the propagation of optical wave been deduced from the electromagnetic theory and the quantum theory introduced by modern physics such as energy level of atom and molecular and the energy band of solid state, the interaction between electromagnetic wave and matter is introduced. The three fundamental components of laser: resonator, active medium, and pumping method are explained. Also the types, characteristics, and applications of various laser are introduced.

description.zh: 先修課程：近代物理。 1.晶體結構與生長 2.晶格振動與聲子   3.能帶理論 4.光電材料基本特性 5.接面理論 6.發光元件   7.檢光元件 8.電荷耦合元件（CCD）   9.液晶顯示（LCD）
description.en: 1.Crystal structures and growth 2.Lattice vibration and phonon 3.Energy-band theory 4.Basic properties of photonic methods 5.Junction theory 6.Light-emitting devices   7.Pgotodetectors 8.Changed-coupled devices   9.Liguid crystal display

description.zh: 修先課程：光學。 本課程利用傅氏轉換理論解釋繞射理論及光影像處理與光資訊處理技術，它包含：1.簡介 2.二維線性系統分析3.繞射理論 4.近場及遠場繞射5.透鏡之傅氏轉換與影像品質分析 6.影像系統之頻域分析7.空間濾波與光資訊處理 8.全像
description.en: This course illustrates the diffraction theory and techniques of image processing and optical information processing by using the methods of Fourier transform. It involves：1. Introduction2.Analysis of 2-D linear systems3.Diffraction theory 4.Fresnel and Fraunhofer diffraction5.Fourier transforming6.Frequency analysis of optical imaging properties of lenses 7.Spatial filtering and optical information processing8.Holography

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study, Seminar, Group Meeting.

name.zh: 製造科技特論及實驗(二)
name.en: Special Topics and Experiments of Manufacturing Technology (

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意本課程包括理論與實務，由製科所教授共同開課。第二學期探討的範圍包含製造設備、量測與檢測，側重在與製造業相關之專業知識。
description.en: This course includes theories and experiments, is conducted by several professors of institute of manufacturing technology. In second semester, topics covered are mainly in the field of manufacturing equipment, measuring and inspection, emphasizing in professional knowledge of manufacturing industry.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意介紹電腦輔助設計及電腦輔助製造的系統及方法。包括：三D工件建圖、設計計算及分析、製造實驗及分析、軟體寫作、網路、NC程式寫作、製程模擬、智慧型製程控制及優化、電腦整合製造系統。
description.en: Introducing the system and methods about computer aided design and manufacturing. Topics covered including: three dimensional parts modeling, calculation and analysis during design process, manufacturing experiment and analysis, software programming, communication network, simulation of manufacturing process, motion control, intelligent manufacturing process control and optimization, computer integrated manufacturing system.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意表面現象, 介面反應等與近代高科技技術, 如鍍膜工程,表面處理, 腐蝕, 磨潤, 微機電, 感測器, 半導體技術等息息相關, 且日益重要。表面分析是原子層次的相關研究, 它包括振動, 電子或離子頻譜分析, 微技術等之應用。主要的項目包含, 表面形貌觀察( SEM, BSEM, AFM ), 成份分析( 光譜分析, 質譜分析, EDX ), 結構分析( XRD, AES, ESCA, XPS ), 鍵結分析( Raman光譜, FTIR ), 表面粗糙度, 膜厚, 附著力, 內應力等膜之特性分析。
description.en: Surface phenomena and processes occurring at interface are becoming increasingly important in a wide variety of industrial applications including the areas of films coating surface treatments, conclusion, triobology, microelectronics, sensors and semi-conductor technologies.  Accompanying this is an ever-growing need for surface characterization allowing better definition of processes occurring at a microscopic level.Surface analysis is the use of vibration, electron or ion spectroscopic and microscopic techniques for the study of material at the atomic level, it includesSEM, AFM, XRD, EDX, ESCA, XPS, AES, Raman Spectrum, and FTIR analysis.

description.zh: 介紹非傳統加工方法及加工相關的自動化與控制技術，包括：製程控制，數值控制，幾何資料處理，進給驅動器，NC機器的位置量測系統，自動化加工的機器監視與診斷，電腦整合製造。
description.en: Introduce the nontraditional manufacturing methods and related automation and control technology, including: process control, numerical control, geometric data processing, driving systems, NC machine position measurement system, automatic manufacturing monitoring and diagnostics, computer integrated manufacturing.

description.zh: 設計相關專題，以文獻研讀，邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: Topical studies in history, theory, and criticism of design. Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses. The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation. Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.。

description.zh: 21世紀的工業設計師已不能再靜待市場研究及產品企劃人員提供產品設計規範，而應以使用者代言人、及企業產品開發整合者身分，主動參與產品策略與企劃，並以視覺化技術協助相關人員作橫向溝通。因此，「產品創新設計策略與企劃」課程主要目標在教導學生以「前瞻性的視野」，透過創新設計的步驟與方法，策劃出符合企業技術及經營體質，並且能滿足市場及使用者使用情況需求的產品。本課程將以理論、方法、案例研討及個案研究方式進行。
description.en: The function of industrial design in the 21st  century, will no longer waiting for the product definition from the marketing and product planning, It will become a integrator and visualizer during the product innovation strategic phase, and concerning to the user's needs.          	Product Innovation Strategy will guide the enterprise looking beyond their current operation to match their technologies and the distinct competencies with emerging the user and the market needs.The contents of this topic will include theory, methodology, and practical case study.

name.zh: 公共戶外家具設計研究

description.zh: 藉由戶外家具案例之分析探討公共環境與人類行為間之關係及公共戶外家具之材料、造形、人機介面、維護與安全等因素，並經由討論形成公共戶外家具之設計思維。
description.en: Case studies on outdoors furniture design to examine the relationship between open space environment and human behavior. The design factors of material, form, ergonomics, maintenance and safety will be studied. Design philosophy of outdoors furniture is to be deliberating in the discussions.

description.zh: 專題報告 專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study, Seminars, Group meeting

description.zh: 程式語言為計算機軟體之基礎，本課程主要探討程式語言之類型以及各種語言之設計原理與特色，經由對這些原理及特色之了解，程式設計師便可針對各類應用之特性選擇最合適之語言。本課程內容包括：1.程式語言之發展與分類，2.設計原理，3.語法與語意，4.資料型態，5.控制結構，6.正規語言，7.抽象資料型態，8.物件導向程式語言，9.函式語言，10.邏輯語言，11.平行處理語言。
description.en: 1.History and paradigm of programming languages 2.Design principles of programming languages 3.Syntex and semantics 4.Data types 5.Control structures 6. Formal languages 7.Abstract data types 8. Object-oriented programming languages 9.Functional programming languages 9.Logic programming languages 10.Parallel processing languages

description.zh: 本課程探討應用物件導向方法從事軟體設計的過程與步驟, 透過課程專題製作,學者將學習以UML記載分析與設計之結果, 並使用一個物件導向語言(如Java或C++)實作之. 課程內容: 1. 物件導向模型 -- UML介紹 2. 物件導向程式語言與環境 3. 物件導向軟體發展週期 3.1 物件導向分析 - 需求分析, 使用個案, 觀念模型, 有限狀態模型  3.2 物件導向設計 - 實際使用個案, 合作圖, 類別圖,  設計模板,  3.3 程式撰寫 - 設計與程式之應對  4. 專題
description.en: This course familiarizes the students with the principles and techniques for object-oriented software development. The students will use UML and an object-oriented language such as Java or C++ to complete a term programming project. Course contents: 1. Object-oriented modeling with UML  2. Object-oriented languages and environments  3. Object-oriented software development process 3.1 Object-oriented analysis - requirement analysis, use case analysis, conceptual models, finite state machine models 3.2 Object-oriented design - real use cases, collaboration diagrams, class design diagrams, design patterns 3.3 Construction - mapping design to codes 4. Term project.

name.zh: 電腦輔助積體電路設計

description.zh: 本課程將給予學習者充分瞭解現代体電路設計技術如何產生矽晶片與應用在各種複雜電子系統上.課程內容如下所述: 1.系統設計流程 2.MOS電晶体理論 3.IC制程技術 4.電路效能評估5.CMOS電路與邏輯設計 6.副系統設計 7.期末專題計劃
description.en: The course dims to give an understanding of how integrated circuit technology is used today to implement complex electronic systems as silicon chips. Contents in the course are 1. System Design Flow 2. MOS Transistor Theory 3. Fnbrcation Process Technology 4. Performance Estimation 5. CMOS circuit and Logic Designs 6. Subsystem Design 7. Final Project

description.zh: 使學生熟悉計算機圖的基本原理、方法、及工具，內容包括： （１）二維及三維幾何圖形之產生 （２）二維及三維何圖形之轉換 （３）隱藏面及隱藏線之處理（４）色彩原理 （５）光影及暗影技術 學生將需撰寫電腦程式或使用幾何算圖程式
description.en: The objective of this course is to familiarize the student with basic principles, methods, and tools of computer graphics. Topics include: 1.Generation of 2D and 3D geometric shapes 2.2D and 3D transformation 3.Hidden surfaces and hidden lines techniques 4.Color principles 5.Shading and shadowing techniques. The student will be required to write computer programs and/or use modeling and rendering packages

description.zh: 本課程將介紹電腦多媒體系統的發展。不同的媒體種類的處理以及相關的技術與概念，將在本課程中作介紹。其中包括電腦圖學，電腦動畫，電腦聲音與音樂，以及電腦視訊。商用的多媒體系統，以及研究階段的多媒體作家系統，也將涵蓋在課程的範圍之中。對多媒體的現今技術與未來，作系統性的討論與說明。課程大綱:多媒體系統簡介，多媒體市場，多媒體套裝，基本媒體--聲音，視訊，影像，動畫，文字；整合環境與套裝--書頁模式，連結模式，邏輯編排模式，展示模式；未來趨勢。
description.en: This course will look the multimedia development in computer science domain. Various media, such sound, video, graphic and animation, will be examined first to illustrate their usage in a computerized environment. Commercial packages will be employed to exercise the multimedia application in selected areas thereafter. Course Outline: Introduction to Multimedia; Multimedia Market; Multimedia Production Packages; Basic Media (Basics & Hardware/Software) - Audio, Video, Image, Animation, Text; Composition Environment/Packages -- Page-Oriented, Node-Link Oriented, Scripting, Demonstration; Future Trend.

description.zh: 0. 簡介 第一部份：源編碼 1. 源編碼定理與熵 2. 非失真壓縮：runlength, Huffman, arithmetic, Lempel-Ziv, * 3. 碼率-失真定理 4. 失真壓縮：量化、預測技術、轉換與次頻帶編碼、MPEG 第二部分：通道編碼 5. 通道編碼定理與通訊容量 6. 有限場簡介7. 區塊碼：CRC, Hamming, Golay, BCH, Reed-Solomon, * 8. 迴旋碼 9. 編碼調變）
description.en: 0. Introduction Part I. Source Coding 1. Source Coding Theorem and Entropy 2. Lossless Compression: runlength, Huffman, arithmetic, Lempel-Ziv, * 3. Rate-Distortion Theorem 4. Lossy Compression: quantization, predictive techniques, transform and subband coding, MPEG Part II. Channel Coding 5. Channel Coding Theorem and Capacity 6. Introduction to Finite Fields 7. Block Codes: CRC, Hamming, Golay, BCH, Reed-Solomon, * 8. Convolutional Codes 9. Coded Modulation

description.zh: 本課程主要探討下列音訊編碼技術：MP-3,Dolby AC-3及DTS。課程內容涵蓋下列項目:1.複習數位訊號處理 2.CD片聲音還原 3.多相位分解 4.次頻段音訊編碼5.個案研究:MP-3,MPEG-2 AAC,AC-3及DTS 6.MPEG-4合成音樂簡介
description.en: 1.This course mainly discusses various audio coding schemes such as MP-3,Dolby AC-3,and DTS.Topics covered in the course include:1.Review of digital signal processing 2.Audio reproduction from CD3.Polyphase decomposition4.Subband coding of audio signals5.Psychoacoustic models6.Case studies:MP-3,MPEG-2 AAC, AC-3,and DTS7.Introduction to Synthetic audio in MPEG-4

description.zh: 本課程將介紹分析及模擬通訊網路效能之技術。課程大綱如下:1.網路效能評估總論 2.網路模擬技術 3.多重存取通訊 4.資料鏈控制模型 5.時間延遲模型 6.流量與擁塞控制 7.網路模擬專題
description.en: The course aims to provide students with analytic and simulation skills for communication network performance evaluation. The course is outlined as follows.1.Performance evaluation overview 2.Simulation techniques 3.Multiple access communications. 4.Data  link control modeling 5.Time delay models in networks 6.Flow and congestion controls 7.Specialtopics in ndtwork simulations.

description.zh: 永續發展是妥善規劃與管理自然資源之最高指導原則，因此本課程依此宗旨討論土壤管理、有害物質處理與處置、水及廢水處理與管理；更將以實際例將面向擴及科技與社經整合層次，以期落實理論於實際應用之中。
description.en: This is intented as a brief introduction to the subject of the substainable development of natural resource. Main subject are soil management, hazardous waste treatment and disposal and water and wastewater treatment and management. Many overall regional case studies will be discussed. It must be technologic, economic and social environmental change or a new factural data are developed

description.zh: 在現代的工程設計與分析中，普遍應用到相關的電腦模式。儘管大部份工程應用電腦模式均以定率式的物理關係作為基礎，但引用電腦模式進行設計，必須考慮隱含在模式輸入與控制參數的不確定性應包含在基本的設計當中。
description.en: In modern engineering designs and analysis, computer models are frequently used. Despite the fact that deterministic relationships are used in most computerized models for engineering, the model outputs are indeterministic due to the uncertain and stochastic nature of the model inputs and parameters. All  the uncertainty may contribute to the stochasticity of the input parameters of a corresponding model which,in turn, result in output uncertainty. Therefore, proper assessment of model output uncertainty is essential.

name.en: Monitoring and Analysis for Environmental Pollutants

description.zh: 本課程著重於環境污染物之微量監測與分析內容，此包括有機有毒物、重金屬之儀器分析原理、化學理論及分析方法。修習本課程宜有化學基礎。
description.en: The course introduces monitoring and analysis for environment pollutants. It focuses the micro quantity analysis based on chemical theory. Modern instruments with high sensitivity will be also discussed.

description.zh: 為涵養水量、維護水質以及保育水土資源，對於集水區內土地的使用，應有適當的規劃與管理牽涉的問題，一般以水資源利用、水質控制、管理計畫等課題加以涵括。因此本課程包含水資源情勢分析、水利法規、水權管理、點源及非點源污染管理、地下水規劃與管理、民眾參與及生態工法於集水區治理工程之應用等，俾提供適度發展及兼顧自然生態機能的集水區社區總體生活，達成「水、土、林、人」四贏之水資源保育總體目標。
description.en: In order to preserve water quantity, to protect water quality, and to conserve soil and water resources, it is necessary to institute appropriate land use regulations in a watershed. In general, it is included water resources utilization, water quality control and management. Therefore the major topics are water resources tendency, water law, water right, point and non-point sources pollution control, ground water management, public participation, ecological working method, etc. With appropriate public participation, the government can work together with people in community development in a manner which will enrich local cultural characteristics, and provide ideas for a sustainable growth, which would lead to a high quality of life and also would protect the watershed's ecology . The ultimate goal of making these efforts is to achieve a " water-soil-trees-men ", four-win situation.

name.zh: 高等電腦輔助機構分析

description.zh: 1.概論  2.最佳化基本理論介紹  3.機構運動分析：解析法  4.連桿組設計分析  5.凸輪機構設計分析  6.齒輪系動力傳遞分析  7.機構的電腦模擬-介紹與實習  8.機構個案分析
description.en: 1.Introduction.2.Introduction to the Optimization Theory.3.Kinematic Analysis of Mechanisms: Analytical Method.4.Linkage Design Analysis.5.Cam Design Analysis.6.Power Flow Analysis of Gear Trains.7.Computer Simulation of Mechanisms: Working Model Software Lab.8.Case Study of Mechanism Design.

description.zh: 1.工程最佳化方法導論2.線性規劃法3.非線性規劃法4.多目標函數最佳化5.近代數學規劃法介紹6.機械之元件與系統之最佳設計
description.en: 1. Introduction to Engineering Optimization Methods. 2.Linear Programming Methods.3.NonLinear Programming Methods.4.Multiobjective Optimization.5. Introduction to Modern Mathematical Programming.  6. Optimum Design of Mechanical Components and Systems.

description.zh: 機械設計原理，機械之精密度與準確度，自動化機械構造分析，驅動進給與定位系統之合成與分析，結構件之靜動態分析，從規格開始之機械設計程序，個案研究等 。
description.en: Theory of machine design, Principles of precision and accuracy, Components of automatic machinery, Synthesis and analysis of feed drive and positioning system, Static and dynamic analysis of structure, Mechanical design process starting with machine specifications, Case study, etc.

description.zh: 簡介,層狀認知網路,倒傳遞網路,學習向量量化網路,自組織映射網路,Hopfisld網路，退火神經網路,應用與實做。
description.en: introduction, layer perceptron, back-propagation network, learning vector qvantization, self-organizing map, hpfield neural network ,annealed neuralnetwork, applications implements.

name.zh: 產業自動化網路資料庫整合
name.en: Integrated Database for Automatic Operation Line

description.zh: 1.生產自動化的理念和製造整合系統介紹2.基本網路原理3.主從架構：NT Client Server,Windows2000 Server/Client,Linux Client/Server4.資料庫系統介紹5.關連式資料庫和Transact-SQL語法介紹6.系統分析和關連表資料庫的正規化7.分散式資料庫與資料庫管理8.網路資料庫發展工具：Java,CGI,ASP,IIS9.網路資料庫的實際生產線上的整合應用
description.en: 1.	Manufacture automation concepts and introduction to manufacture Integrated system. 2. Basic Network Principle. 3. Client and Server architecture :NT Client server, window 2000 Client /Server, and Linux Client/Server.4. Introduction to database system. 5.Relational database and transact-SQL. 6. System analysis and database normalization. 7. Distributed database and administrator of the database.8. Developmented tools of web-database : Java, CGI, J-builder, IIS,ASP. 9.Applications in practial operation-line.

name.zh: 電腦輔助積體電路設計

description.zh: 本課程將給予學習者充分瞭解現代積體電路設計技術；如何產生矽晶片與應用在各種複雜電子系統上。課程內容如下所述：1.系統設計流程 2.MOS電晶體理論 3.IC製程設計4.電路效能評估 5.CMOS電路與邏輯設計  6.副系統設計   7.期末專題計劃
description.en: The course aims to give an understanding of how integrated circuit technology is used today to implement complex electronic systems as silicon chips. Contents in the course are:1. System Design Flow. 2. MOS Transistor Theory. 3. Fabrcation Process Technology.4.Performance Estimation. 5. CMOS circuit and Logic Designs.6.Subsystem Design. 7.Final Project.

description.zh: 構法計畫是建築計畫重要的一部份，也是本地建築研究亟待加強的部份。本課程藉著系統整合的途徑讓學生掌握建築系統組合的機制與操作的方法，藉以提昇建築設計的密度與建築的品質。課程內容包括：    現代系統理論介紹    建築系統的分解與組合    系統整合的觀念與手法 構法整合實例與實驗
description.en: The planning of building system is an essential part of architectural planning. But it needs strengthen badly in our architecture study. In this course we use a systematic approach to handle the mechanism of integration in building systems, and the method of conduction, that may promote our design density and building quality. This course contents:    Introduction of contemporary System Theory    Divide and unify of building systems    Concepts and methods of System Integration    Cases and experiments of integration in building systems

description.zh: 造形藝術是含蓋平面與立體之形的組合，造形藝術包容室內與室外的公共藝術，有美化環境陶冶人性的功能。城市、社區的美化和總體營造需而以造形藝術原理來發揮應用。本課程著重在理論與視覺化之研究。
description.en: Study of theory and visualized practice of art form that consists of two and three dimension form study including their visual features and ways of composition.

description.zh: 由於台灣地小人稠,為了更有效利用土地,達到更高之生產量,使得土壤污染問題特別顯得重要,因此整治土壤污染是刻不容緩.本課程對於土壤污染之整治由萃取,氣提,固定安定化,淋洗,電熔等物化方法傳授之,其次講授生物復育技術,最後以工程經濟角度,進行本益比分析。.
description.en: There are many remediate methods in this class.The methods include solvent extraction,air stripping,solidification/stabilization,solid flushing,and thermel treatment.This f topicalso includes bioremediation and cost effective analysis.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 一、 簡介二、 數學模式三、 小信號干擾之系統響應四、 同步機之模擬五、 同步機之線性模式六、 激磁系統七、 激磁對穩定度之影響八、 多機組系統之穩定度
